Articles.Content: Here's the ship I used which got me to land on Ike and on Duna, completely .17 stock

Hey man, I hope it's good, but can you upload some pics on the forums?

That would be nice, thanks!
Yes, people won't download it unless there are pics. No pics no clicks.

If you're that concerned about it, you could download it and take a picture yourself. It's had 103 clicks so far, must be working for some people. I'm already working on a new craft capable of getting to jool.

Gamah it is very important to upload pics if you dont there will be way less people clicking if you dont, also if you dont upload pics people might upload their own original design with pics, but it could be realy similar to yours, so if they didn't know what yours looked like because of no pics you cant say it was your design.
The design is there and timestamped from when I uploaded it. I don't mind if people rip it off, I'm nearly done with my Jool-capable ship anyway.

Damnit Gamah!This is why we can't have nice things! seriously though, its kinda lame to make a thread and not post pics of your craft.... And flight instructions would be nice, I couldn't get your ship very far at all. I am not a skilled pilot though, so that doesn't mean that it's incapable, I just didn't seem to get very far before I ran out of fuel.

*snip* You sir, just lost your posting privileges. -DR

Edited September 22, 2012 by Damion Rayne

Please post pics from now on. Thread locked before it turns bad.

-DR
